QuestData.Title: Missing Treasure!
QuestData.Description:
Which one o' you scurvy dogs dug up me treasure?!
Was it you, Ned? I know you was in the Dead Man's Tale when I were talkin' about it!
Or maybe it was ol' Nance Barmy, huh? Yer the one what fed me all them drinks in the first place!
Oh and don't think I forgot about you, Nub Nub! I ain't trust a hozen as far as I can throw 'em... which I guess is PRETTY FAR, but--
<Several lines are scratched out here.>
Someone stole me damn treasure!
<Signed with an X.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask Ned, Nance Barmy, and Nub Nub about the treasure, then find it.
QuestData.RewardText: <This diamond must have been among the mysterious outlaw's cache of dried meats and other "treasures."$B$BYou carefully remove it from the dog poo.>
